main.name: Bruno Rocha
main.description: I am a full-stack developer focused on creating efficient and scalable web solutions. I have a solid foundation in JavaScript, React, Node.js, Java, Spring Boot, and MongoDB, along with practical experience in full-stack projects, both academic and professional. I am studying Software Engineering at 42 Rio and have also completed complementary training programs with TripleTen and Oracle Next Education (ONE), which strengthened my mastery of front-end and back-end development. I am driven by curiosity and a constant desire to learn. I enjoy problem-solving, thinking about usability, and working in teams to build products that truly work.
